alert.note: Alert for Johnson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 3:53PM EST until December 19 at 7:07AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis IN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana... Youngs Creek at Amity. Mississinewa River near Ridgeville. .Rain of 1 to 1.5 inches Friday night into early Saturday has led to rapid rises along area rivers and streams. Flooding along Youngs Creek and the Mississinewa River are expected to be brief with flooding ending by Sunday morning. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Youngs Creek at Amity. * WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Youngs Creek at flood stage. Most low areas along creek are flooded. Approaches to CR 400S bridge over Youngs Creek begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 PM EST Saturday the stage was 7.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 7.3 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued late tonight by around 245 AM EST.
